name: HMI Junkship Package
desc: Enables heavy industry to construct literal trash that could be misconstrued as space ships often found in Hazard Mining Incorporated and Scavenger fleets.

name: HMI Techmined Package
desc: Enables heavy industry to construct the more advanced vessels often seen in the employ of Hazard Mining Incorporated.

name: HMI Modification Package
desc: Enables heavy industry to construct hulls, weapons, and fighter LPCs used by the Hazard Mining Incorporated, with a focus on mining operations.

name: Domain Resurgent Blueprint Package
desc: Enables heavy industry to construct hulls modified by the Domain Resurgent, with a focus on strong defense and mobility and powerful, pilotless fighter craft.
